query.value: InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'kube_replicaset_spec_replicas' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend replicaset = tostring(Json.replicaset) | extend namespace = tostring(Json.namespace) | join kind=inner ( InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'kube_replicaset_status_ready_replicas' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend replicaset = tostring(Json.replicaset) | extend namespace = tostring(Json.namespace) | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, ReadyReplicas=Val, replicaset, namespace) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, replicaset, namespace | where Val - ReadyReplicas > 0 | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, Replicas=Val, ReadyReplicas, replicaset, namespace
